description: Expected error messages for invalid input files. Error messages should match exactly (excluding OS-specific parts in include errors).

invalid_binary.pax.description: Binary number with invalid characters (not 0 or 1)

unexpected_token.pax.description: Missing colon between key and value

include_not_found.pax.message_prefix: Parse error: Failed to include nonexistent_file.pax:

invalid_magic.paxb.description: Binary file with incorrect magic bytes

notes.message: Exact error message - must match exactly
notes.message_prefix: Error message must start with this prefix (OS-specific suffix)
notes.message_pattern: Regex pattern the error message must match
